analysis.description:
EmcoToken.getCurrentDayDeposited (/unique_chucks/1/0x9a07fd8a116b7e3be9e6185861496af7a2041460.sol#593-603) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- now / 86400 == currentDay

EmcoToken.getCurrentDayDeposited (/unique_chucks/1/0x9a07fd8a116b7e3be9e6185861496af7a2041460.sol#593-603) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- now / 86400 == currentDay
EmcoToken.getDaysForReward (/unique_chucks/1/0x9a07fd8a116b7e3be9e6185861496af7a2041460.sol#606-617) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- lastMiningBalanceUpdateTime[msg.sender] == 0

EmcoToken.getCurrentDayDeposited (/unique_chucks/1/0x9a07fd8a116b7e3be9e6185861496af7a2041460.sol#593-603) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- now / 86400 == currentDay
EmcoToken.getDaysForReward (/unique_chucks/1/0x9a07fd8a116b7e3be9e6185861496af7a2041460.sol#606-617) uses a dangerous strict equality:

EmcoToken.updateCurrentDayDeposited (/unique_chucks/1/0x9a07fd8a116b7e3be9e6185861496af7a2041460.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- now / 86400 == currentDay

	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(referralCodeOwners(_code) != address(0),no referral with this code) (/unique_chucks/1/0x9a07fd8a116b7e3be9e6185861496af7a2041460.sol#447-448)
	- require(bool,string)(referrals(msg.sender) == address(0),referral is already set) (/unique_chucks/1/0x9a07fd8a116b7e3be9e6185861496af7a2041460.sol#449-451)
	- referrer = referralCodeOwners(_code) (/unique_chucks/1/0x9a07fd8a116b7e3be9e6185861496af7a2041460.sol#451)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- refs (/unique_chucks/1/0x9a07fd8a116b7e3be9e6185861496af7a2041460.sol#453)

	- userRefCodes (/unique_chucks/1/0x9a07fd8a116b7e3be9e6185861496af7a2041460.sol#397-398)
